actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend the traineeship program for professional public health personnel, and project grants for graduate training in public health under the Public Health Service Act.

summary.text: Extends the traineeship program for professional public health personnel, and project grants for graduate training in public health under the Public Health Service Act. Authorizes the appropriation of funds for such extensions.

titles.title: A bill to extend the traineeship program for professional public health personnel, and project grants for graduate training in public health under the Public Health Service Act.
